column5: After reading all the raves about the Helly Hansen Alpha floater suit, I told my wife I wanted one for xmas. She has been looking for a couple of weeks now and can't find one anywhere. Does anyone know where she can get one and how much it is. I was hoping to stay warm this year ice fishing. I almost had a two man clam off our classifieds but at the last minute the guy backed out and left me hanging. I think he got a better offer... people can be soooooo rude!! lol Thanks guys. SS

I had the same thing happen to me last year when I saw a Clam on the classified section in this site...I was left in the dark with no reply  Anyway, did your wife try LeBaron for the HH suit???  Steve

Try Angling Outfitters in Wood stock I know they had alot of them in there last week. I have the Delta and love it I bought it from Slowpoke he bought the Alpha and I think he wanted the Delta back. I have heard from a few people that they like the Delta better its one step down from the Alpha but I never get cold in it even when it was so cold that the minnows were freezing stiff before we could get the hooks into them now shelter and I was warm.
Angling Outfitters on Hwy 2 Woodstock has a whole rack of them 519 539 5494
i got mine at Grimsby tackel. i see you are from ajax so tell your wife to give jeff a call at the store. he will answer all her questions.

Haha The wife is amazed. She complained to me about not being able to find one of these suits and I told her "no worries honey, I'll just check with the members on OFC" All the info and answers needed in about twenty minutes. Where else can you get info on anything that quick. LOL Only here at OFC!! Thanks guys for all your help.  Stan
